page.title: 12A River Walk
page.content: Today we went for a walk. We went to the river side. We started at the distillery and walked all the way from there. The first thing we saw was the horse Heidi. The next thing we saw was the big old house. When we went up to the farm we picked some sticky willies and we were playing with them. We also went along the bank of the golf course. we saw that parts of the bank were falling off and we also saw that the water was not clear. Up a bit from the bridge we saw grass cuttings in the water; then up a bit from that the water was very rough. I thought it was going over stones. When we were on the bank by the golf course we had to be quiet because there were people playing golf. On the way back we counted how many steps we took to cross the bridge. I took one hundred and seventy six.
